name: Used Car Sale
description: Agent A is selling a used car. Agent B wants to buy it. They must negotiate a price.

agent_a_secrets.reason: Need money fast for emergency expenses
agent_a_secrets.bottom_line: Will accept $500 if buyer pays cash today

agent_b_secrets.reason: Looking for reliable transportation, not in rush

agreement_criteria.success_condition: Both agents agree on a price within their acceptable ranges
agreement_criteria.failure_condition: No agreement reached after maximum rounds or agents walk away
